title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 71.1 - Appointing officer may see application; restrictions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 71.1 - Appointing officer may see application; restrictions

State Regulations
A candidate's application for examination may be exhibited, upon request, to the appointing officer to whom his name is certified, or to
his representative; provided, however, that information therein relating to the
candidate's national origin or indicating whether his citizenship is by birth
or naturalization shall not be divulged. Before a candidate's application for
examination is exhibited to the appointing officer or his representative, all
reference therein to the candidate's national origin or to the basis of his
citizenship shall be concealed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
71.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
